author: rbb
msg: Fix a couple of typos in some Makefiles.

author: rbb
msg: Allow 'make install DESTDIR=/path'.  This allows packagers to install
into a directory different from the one that was configured.  This
also mirrors the root= feature from 1.3.  We cannot use prefix=,
because both APR and APR-util resolve their installation paths at
configuration time.  This means that there is no variable prefix

author: aaron
msg: thereby defaulting to portable binaries on those systems that could
be optimized at the expense of portability.

author: bnicholes
msg: Building the wrong dso.c in the make files.  Switched to the Netware version.

author: wrowe
msg: Lowercase macros, per Roy Fielding's comments and general concensus.
